name: unfinished bonsai sim
description:
Didn't use my time well in the jam and ended up with this, the plan was you would shape and prune the tree and see it grow through several years with a little story along with it. I wasn't really enthused with the "keep it alive" theme so I'm happy to get something out. 

Controls are click to drag, and click a branch to twist it around, I didn't figure out the pruning system so that's all there is to it.
